title: The Discarded Ones
description: They had many names: Mount Bachelor Academy, Cedu School, and Boulder Creek Academy. Some called them cults, some said the schools saved their lives. But none of them were free to leave. Charlie Hoff was there. Soon you will be, too. Unlock the mysteries of The Academy with Charlie as he faces the hardest decision of his life: escape or assimilate. Neither will be easy.
author: James Tipper
